active.name: Crippling Shot
active.description:
Ranged attack that slows the target by 60% for 3 seconds.

Cooldown: 6 seconds
active.simpleDescription: Deals damage and slows the target.

active.name: Poison Bolts
active.description:
Ranged attack which deals 40% weapon damage and an additional 40% weapon damage as Poison over 3 seconds.

Cooldown: 6 seconds

active.name: Dirty Fighting
active.description:
Blinds enemies in front of the Scoundrel for 3 seconds.

Cooldown: 30 seconds

active.name: Vanish
active.description:
The Scoundrel vanishes in a cloud of smoke when injured, reappearing after 5 seconds. While vanished, he will heal himself for 15505 Life.

Cooldown: 30 seconds
active.simpleDescription: The Scoundrel temporarily vanishes when in danger.

active.name: Powered Shot
active.description:
Powerful ranged attack that explodes on impact, dealing 25% weapon damage as Arcane to targets within 6 yards and has a 50% chance to Stun targets for 2 seconds.

Cooldown: 20 seconds
active.simpleDescription: Deals massive damage in an area and knocks back enemies.

active.name: Multishot
active.description: The Scoundrel's ranged attacks fire 3 bolts at a time.
active.simpleDescription: The Scoundrel's attacks shoot multiple bolts.

active.name: Hysteria
active.description: Whenever you or the Scoundrel land a Critical Hit, you both will go into hysterics, increasing all damage done by 10% for 3 seconds. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
active.simpleDescription: Critical Hits cause you and the Scoundrel to temporarily deal more damage.

active.name: Anatomy
active.description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 3% for the Scoundrel and his allies.
active.simpleDescription: Increases the Critical Hit Chance of the Scoundrel and his allies.
